game.name: Squiggle Drop
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 물리 퍼즐을 풀기 위해 도형을 그려보세요! 고유한 목표를 가진 250개 이상의 레벨이 있습니다. 다리, 지렛대, 무게 등을 만들어 뇌를 테스트하세요. 목표를 달성할 때까지 여러 번 솔루션을 반복하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Draw shapes to solve physics puzzles! Over 250 levels each with their own unique objective. Put your brain to the test by making bridges, levers, weights and more. Iterate on your solutions again and again until you complete the goals.
